name: Q&A Time + Qantas 737 Economy Class Review
description:
Finally found the time to do that Q&A video.   Thanks heaps for all the questions - hopefully I've managed to answer most of them.  If not please let me know via comment below. 

Also included in this video are my plans for 2018 and a quick review of the Qantas 737 domestic economy class which I filmed on my 74th flight of the year a few days ago. 

My apologies for the poor editing quality of this video - my mate who's a professional editor who normally does all my editing is on holiday so I thought I'd give it a go myself.  
 
Enjoy and all the best for a sensational 2018!

Here are the links referred to in the video:

My Work:    www.bunniktours.com.au
My Work YouTube:   https://www.youtube.com/bunniktours
Etihad A380 First Class Apartment:  https://youtu.be/vAl5AFzQyIo
